lines.text: [Brick and his friends rescue June and Professor Salisbury from a death trap set to go off at noon]
But we had seconds to spare.
[June and Professor Salisbury are tied to chairs directly in front of one of Dr. Tymak's lethal inventions]

In exactly ten minutes, the radioactive ray will be turned on and our *friends* will be directly in its path. Here's a chance, Professor, to see how good a logical mind really is. You have ten minutes.
